name: Solar system (itch) (mangirdas91)
description:
My very first UNITY build. Solar system project for Coursera course. The following have been added:

  • All planets;
  • Additional sounds for other planets;
  • Changed the skybox to Milky Way view
  • Added a ring to Saturn;
  • Distance between planets is as per real life life ratio; (Earth being set as 1)
  • Planets are orbiting the sun at a correct ration (Earth being set as 10)
  • Changed the rotation script to accept the floating values instead of int. 

Credits:

  • Milky Way Skybox - Adam Bielecki (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/milky-way-skybox-940...)

Created by Mangirdas Zavackas
